title: BMI Calculator
description: Based on height and weight inputs, the calculator will display the user's Body Mass Index, as well as the appropriate weight condition - ranging from Underweight to Obese.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A grid-based game where two players take turns marking Xs and Os in a 3x3 board. The goal is to align three of your symbols either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally before your opponent does.

title: Landmeter Geenen
description: A simple, responsive website for a surveying business. Crafted with a modern design and elegant interface, the website boasts three captivating pages: Home, Services, and Contact.
